messages.ERR_UNKNOWN: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
messages.ERR_ONLY_IN_SERVER: You can only perform this action inside a server.
messages.ERR_ONLY_IN_THREAD: You can only perform this action inside a thread.
messages.ERR_ONLY_THREAD_OWNER: You need to be the thread owner to perform this action.
messages.ERR_NO_EFFECT: This action will have no effect.
messages.ERR_JSON_INVALID: Your input was not valid JSON. You can use an online tool such as <https://onlinejsontools.com/validate-json> to validate your json.
messages.ERR_CONFIG_INVALID:
Your config was invalid. Remember to: 
- Pass minified JSON, because new lines inside commands does not work in Discord. You can use an online tool such as <https://onlinejsontools.com/minify-json> for minification.
- Wrap the config in an object. 
- Spell property keys correctly.

If you need help with the formatting, you can see the default config of Needle at <https://github.com/MarcusOtter/discord-needle/blob/main/src/config.json>. Changes to `discordApiToken` and `dev` will be ignored by this command.
messages.ERR_PARAMETER_MISSING: A non-optional parameter is missing from the command.
messages.ERR_INSUFFICIENT_PERMS: You do not have permission to perform this action.
messages.ERR_CHANNEL_VISIBILITY: The $CHANNEL channel is not visible to the bot. Change the permissions and try again.
messages.ERR_THREAD_MESSAGE_MISSING: The starting message for this thread could not be found, which prevents this action from being performed.
messages.SUCCESS_THREAD_CREATE:
Hello $USER!
This thread has been automatically created from your message in $CHANNEL $TIME_AGO.

**Want to unsubscribe from this thread?**
Right-click the thread (or use the `...` menu) and select **Leave Thread**.

**Want to change the title?**
Use the `/title` command!

**Done using the thread?**
Click the button below to archive it.
messages.SUCCESS_THREAD_ARCHIVE:
**This thread will be archived soon** :card_box:
As requested by $USER, this thread will automatically be archived when **one hour passes without any new messages**.

• The thread's content will still be searchable with Discord's search function
• Anyone will be able to un-archive the thread at any point in the future by sending a message in the thread again
